title: Interpretation of a dream about entering an unfamiliar house for a divorced woman

preview.html: What is the vision of the unknown house and entering it? It is a vision that puts the person who sees it in a state of thinking, whether it is dreams, whether it is visions that can be interpreted. We will answer all of this through this site gptafser.com/. Interpretation of the vision of entering an unknown house in a dream for a single girl. The unknown house in The dream of an unmarried girl has many connotations. Among them is the unknown house in which the unmarried girl was afraid in the dream. It is a sign of the fears that exist within the dreamer and may be caused by a lack of self-confidence or the absence of someone holding him back. If the unmarried girl sees the house unknown The familiar is in a scary place, and I looked at all the features of the house in the dream with amazement. The vision indicates the fluctuations that the dreamer faces during his work or study, and God knows best. When you enter the unknown house in a dream for an unmarried girl. The vision may indicate an incomprehensible love relationship, and God knows best. Wandering in the unknown house in a single girl’s dream. This means that he will achieve many accomplishments that will surprise everyone because it will lead to an unexpected achievement thanks to God Almighty. As for asking permission before entering the unknown house of an unmarried girl in a dream. It is a sign of respect that distinguishes insight among people. It may indicate her fear of God Almighty. When she sees someone she knows inside the unknown house in a dream about a girl. It is a sign that there is a person who loves and respects her, and is comfortable talking to her. See also: Interpretation of a dream about building a new house for a married man. Interpretation of seeing a married woman entering an unknown house. Familiar in a dream: The unknown house is evacuated in the dream of a married woman. It indicates the presence of some inappropriate behavior on the part of the person with insight, and God knows best. While you see the unknown house made of iron that the married woman enters in the dream. It is a sign of health and longevity, and all life is in hand. God alone. If a married woman was looking for her home and was tired, she saw an unknown house and entered it in a dream. It is one of the dreams that suggests that she is tired of the responsibilities that fall on her and indicates that she will be away from those responsibilities for a period of time. A dream of entering an unknown house may symbolize A familiar full of roses to a married woman’s dream. It is a sign of the happiness she feels in her married life. It was said about seeing entering an unfamiliar house with a married woman in a dream. The dreamer is in a state of anxiety and tension about life’s issues. Entering the unknown White House in a married woman’s dream An indication of the great good that she is doing in her life, and it may indicate stability in life. Interpretation of a dream about entering an unfamiliar house for a man and its meaning. If a married man sees the unknown house and enters that house in a dream. He will search for a new source of livelihood or a new job to increase his income. This happens in If he is looking for a source of livelihood in reality. You see yourself entering the greenhouse in a married man’s dream. It is a sign that this person has all the wrong morals and is talking about the wrong people. It could indicate that there are some problems inside her home and this makes it weak and can be demolished at any time. Just a moment, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. As for if

title: Interpretation of seeing soup or stew in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing soup or soup in a dream via the website roy2a.com Seeing soup or soup in a dream means healing from diseases and ailments, enjoying good health, removing stress and distress, hearing good news, cooking vegetables and feeding relatives, means reconciliation with differences, and we will explain that in this article. Interpretation of the vision Soup or soup in a dream is a mouthful for single girls, pregnant women, single women, children, divorcees, and widows, by presenting the interpretations of the great imams in interpreting dreams and visions, such as Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, Ibn Katheer, al-Nabulsi, and other translators in ancient and modern times. Follow us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of Ibn Seeing soup or soup in a dream? Seeing soup or soup in a dream indicates recovery from illness. Seeing eating soup in a dream indicates a feeling of loneliness, isolation, and psychological suffering. Seeing eating soup in a dream indicates hearing good news and obtaining a lot of money, as well as prosperity. And psychological comfort. In a man’s dream, it indicates earning money from lawful sources. I see in a dream that I am eating meat soup. It indicates recovery from diseases and ailments and enjoyment of good health. See also: Interpretation of seeing eating meat in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing soup or stew in a dream for a single woman? If a girl sees herself eating Seafood soup in a dream indicates achieving goals, passing difficult stages, and achieving the highest positions. Seeing a girl eating meat soup in a dream indicates good luck, comfort, and peace of mind. If a girl sees that she is eating vegetable soup with meat, it indicates achieving desires and goals, and facilitating their affairs. And hearing the good news. See also: The interpretation of seeing grilled meat in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing soup or stew in a dream for a married woman? If a married woman sees herself in a dream eating soup, this indicates the end of worry and worry, psychological comfort and reassurance. If she sees a married woman in a dream cooking Vegetable soup, announces reconciliation with her husband if there are problems or disagreements or reconciliation with the family if she provides food to one of her family members. Seeing meat soup for a married woman indicates recovery from illness and the ability to live. See also: Interpretation of seeing cooked meat in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing soup or Soup in a dream for a pregnant woman? If a pregnant woman dreams that she is drinking vegetable soup that contains carrots, this indicates the approaching date of childbirth, the ease of childbirth, and the elimination of fatigue. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is cooking vegetable soup or oatmeal, this indicates ease of childbirth, the cessation of pain and fatigue, and the health of the newborn. See also: Interpretation of seeing unleavened bread, cheese, meat, or thyme pies in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing soup or stew in a divorced woman’s dream? If a divorced woman dreams that she is eating sparrow soup, it indicates achieving what she wants and the prosperity of hearing happy news. Seeing lentil soup in the final dream indicates gaining A prestigious job and loss of fatigue, anxiety and sadness. What is the interpretation of a dream about orzo soup? Seeing a bird’s tongue drinking in

title: Interpretation of a dream about transporting an unmarried girl by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about an unmarried girl getting pregnant: Seeing an unmarried pregnancy in a dream is one of the visions that heralds the coming of kindness, nourishment, and hearing happy news. In the following lines, we will talk about the appropriate interpretation according to the social status of the dreamer, according to the words of leading scholars and interpreters. To know more details, follow this article. Interpretation of a dream about an unmarried girl being pregnant: When an unmarried girl sees that she is pregnant in a dream, this may indicate the fulfillment of the desires that this girl sought in the previous period. In fact, the virgin was pregnant and was happy with the news of the pregnancy in the dream, and this is a sign of success in her studies and she will obtain Highest grades. Watching an unmarried girl get pregnant in a dream is a good omen for her that the problems she was facing will end and that the time has come to get rid of her worries. If a girl is suffering from an illness and sees herself pregnant in a dream, this leads to her recovery from this illness. Interpretation The dream of carrying an unmarried girl according to Ibn Sirin: Carrying an unmarried girl in a dream is a sign of a new beginning and a change in life for the better, and when a girl sees in a dream that she is carrying a child whose appearance looks very bad and she was unmarried, this symbolizes the presence of disagreements, sadness, and many problems and worries for the viewer. The girl’s pregnancy With a beautiful baby is a sign that she heard some happy news that she has been waiting for for many years. If the dreamer is sad with the news of pregnancy in a dream, it means that she is not satisfied with her life and does not thank God for the blessings that God has given her, and this dream serves as a warning to her. Seeing An unmarried girl is pregnant in a dream and is happy to hear the news of the pregnancy from the doctor, then this is a sign that she will move to an important job. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for an engaged girl When an engaged woman dreams that she is pregnant and has not been married before, this symbolizes that the fiancée is a rich man who has a lot of money. If she is pregnant An engaged girl in a dream is evidence that she will live happily and her life will be happy after marriage. If the girl is engaged and her fiancé is suffering from a financial or moral crisis and she sees herself pregnant in a dream, this is a sign that she will stand by his side and work with him to get out of this crisis. The fiancée’s pregnancy in The dream is an indication that marriage will take place in the next few days, but if the fiancée is sad because of the pregnancy, this means that she will separate from her partner, and her engagement will not be the same. complete. What is the interpretation of a dream about a single woman getting pregnant without getting married? Seeing a girl in a dream that she is pregnant without getting married, this may symbolize that the girl may go through a period of poverty and hunger. When an unmarried girl dreams that she is pregnant without getting married, this is an indication of many... Obstacles that stand in a girl’s way to prevent her from achieving her goals. If a girl in a dream is pregnant outside of wedlock, this may indicate that she is committing immorality and committing sins and transgressions and that she must repent for that. The interpretation of a girl’s pregnancy without marriage is a sign of many worries and problems, A dream about an abnormal pregnancy may lead to...

title: Interpretation of a dream about kneeling in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of prostration in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of the dream of prostration in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Whoever dreams that he prostrates and prostrates and prays to God Almighty, then submits to Him and frees himself from arrogance and sets God’s limits and obligations. And he gets what he wants in religion and in this world quickly and triumphs over those who oppose him. He forgives, and the worshiper punishes him, if he prostrates, and repents of his sin, and repents, he is freed from his dangers, and his need is satisfied, and he is forgiven, and he is forgiven and his life is prolonged. And whoever dreams: that he worshipped other than God Almighty or fell on his face unintentionally in prisons, he is humiliated and disappointed, if he is in a dispute or war or quarrel. And if he is in trade, he loses, and if he is in a need that is not fulfilled, and if he falls on a mountain worshiping God Almighty, he wins an invincible man. And if he is on a hill or a wall, he is subject to a weak person who disappoints him, and kneeling in a dream is evidence of faith in God and repentance for the sinner. Interpretation of the dream of Hajj in HajjPerhaps prostration and prostration indicate Hajj, as God Almighty says: (Purify My house is for those who circumambulate, those who stand, and those who prostrate and prostrate. Perhaps bowing indicates following the Sunnah and accompanying the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, in Paradise, and bowing in a dream is a sign of victory. And evidence of repentance from sins, and evidence of earning money, and evidence of longevity, and evidence of salvation from dangers. Bowing is victory and justice in matters, and bowing is a blessing bestowed by God on those who see it. And whoever sees: a golden brick bending a brick of silver, and the honest person submits to the evil man, and from prison to the cross, and submits to a hypocritical people to play the strings, sing and musical instruments. Interpretation of bowing in gratitude in a dream by Al-Nabulsi: Al-Nabulsi interprets bowing in gratitude in a dream as a sign of the end of a period full of worries and sorrow. Whoever finds in his dream that he worships God with gratitude, this is a sign that his sadness has ended. He lost his worries and was saved from many troubles. And God compensated him for it by filling his heart with lawful money or righteous offspring. Seeing the bow of gratitude in a dream, according to Al-Nabulsi’s vision, indicates that the dreamer has a strong faith in God And he feels grateful for his blessings upon him. If the dreamer is a non-Muslim, then this dream is a sign that he will soon declare his Islam. If he was characterized by hypocrisy, he will repent from it and complete his speech. However, if he is a Muslim, then he will enjoy the company of the righteous.
preview.text: Interpretation of seeing prostration in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream of prostration in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Whoever dreams of prostrating, prostrating, and praying to God Almighty, then submits to Him and rids himself of arrogance and sets God’s limits and obligations. He will quickly obtain what he wants in religion and in this world and conquer those who are hostile to him. He forgives. And the praying person chastises him, if he prostrates, repents of his sin, repents, is saved from his dangers, his needs are satisfied, and is forgiven, and forgiving him will prolong his life. And whoever dreams that he is a servant other than God Almighty or falls on his face unintentionally in prisons, then he will be humiliated and disappointed, if If he is in a dispute, war or quarrel. If he is in trade, he loses. If he is in need that is not fulfilled. If he falls on a mountain, worshiping the Almighty God, he will win an invincible man. If he is on a hill or a wall, then he is subject to a weak person who will disappoint him. Kneeling In a dream, it is evidence of faith in God and repentance for the sinner. Interpretation of a dream about Hajj in HajjPerhaps prostration and prostration indicate Hajj, according to the Almighty’s saying: (Purify My House for whoever circumambulates and whoever stands and whoever prostrates and prostrates). Perhaps bowing indicates following the Sunnah and accompanying the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, in Paradise, and bowing In a dream, it is a sign of victory. Evidence of repentance from sins, evidence of earning money, evidence of longevity, and evidence of salvation from dangers. Kneeling is a victory and justice in matters, and kneeling is a blessing that God has bestowed upon whoever sees it. And whoever sees: a golden brick bends a silver brick, and an honest person submits. For the evil man, and from prison to the cross, and submitting to a hypocritical people to the beating of strings, singing, and musical instruments. Interpretation of bowing of gratitude in a dream by Al-Nabulsi: Al-Nabulsi interprets bowing of gratitude in a dream as a sign of the end of a period full of worries and sorrow. Whoever finds in his dream that he is worshiping God with gratitude, this is a sign. However, his sadness was over. He lost his worry and was saved from many troubles. And God compensated him for it by filling his heart with legitimate money or good offspring. Seeing a bow of thanks in a dream, according to Al-Nabulsi’s vision, indicates that the dreamer has a strong faith in God and feels grateful for His blessings upon him. If If the dreamer is one of the people of the Dhimmah, then this dream is a sign that he will soon announce his conversion to Islam. If he is characterized by hypocrisy, he will repent of it and complete his speech. However, if he is a Muslim, then he will enjoy the company of righteous people.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a big house and many rooms for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a large house and many rooms in a dream for one girl: When a girl sees in a dream that the house is large and filled with many rooms, this means that she will marry a rich man with good qualities. Seeing a large house and many rooms in a dream symbolizes upcoming changes in her work. And if He saw in a dream that the construction of the new house was delayed, this indicates a delay in marriage, and God knows best. Seeing entering the new house and the presence of mud in it is a sign of problems in the marriage, and God knows best. When a girl cleans the house of mud, this indicates that the problems will be solved, thanks to God Almighty. See also: Seeing the dead in A new house. Interpretation of seeing a big house and many rooms in a dream for a married woman. This vision for a married woman indicates the remorse that touches her heart for the transgressions and sins she committed against God. And God knows best. Seeing a large house filled with many rooms indicates the possibility of pregnancy, God willing. This dream of a married woman is good news for her that she will be promoted in the workplace. A large house full of rooms shows that he has obtained another prestigious job. God knows best. Seeing the house A new house is a sign of marriage to a man who has good qualities and good morals. A new house in a dream for a married woman indicates the goodness and comfort that will come to her, God willing. Seeing a new house in a dream is considered good news for pregnancy, God willing. And if a married woman sees in a dream that the new house is dark. And there is no light, this indicates bad morals in marriage, and God knows best. When a married woman sleeps in a dream, she moves from one house to another, but from a new house. This dream symbolizes a feeling of stability in married life. She moves from one house to another for a married woman in a dream But she moves alone, without her husband. It could indicate separation due to problems and marital strife that broke out between them, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a large house and many rooms in a dream about a man and its meaningWhen a man sees in a dream a large house that contains many rooms. This dream warns him By achieving great success at work. Read also: Interpretation of dreams of building a new house for a married man. The meaning of seeing a large house and many rooms in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. When a pregnant woman sees a vision of a large house filled with many rooms. This showed that she gave birth easily and smoothly, by God’s command. Seeing a house A large house with many rooms, and this indicates the gender of the fetus, and it is a memory of God knows best. This dream may be good news for her that her child will be righteous and have good morals, God willing. And if she is found in a large house with many rooms, this indicates that she will become A rich woman in the future. When she sees the new, unfinished house in a pregnant woman’s dream, this indicates the occurrence of marital disputes. The new house in a pregnant woman’s dream is considered good news for her for an easy birth, and that the new baby will be healthy and free of diseases, thank God. A pregnant woman buying a new house in a dream is a sign that she is carrying a female in her womb, and God knows best. And if she enters the new house, then...

title: Wearing a neckline in a dream for a divorced woman

preview.html: The vision of wearing an earring is different from the vision of buying an earring in a dream, as they both show unique meanings. Seeing a silver earring has a different meaning than gold in the interpretation. What is the meaning of this vision, and this is what we will discuss in the following lines from the gptafser.com/ website. Interpretation of the vision of wearing a ring in a dream for a single girl. Seeing a girl She is unmarried in her dream and is wearing an earring made of gold. The vision means that the girl will get married soon. And if he sees in the dream that he is wearing a silver earring. The vision here shows that she will be engaged to a respectable young man who has all his love and respect for her. Or if he sees a girl in a dream pulling her neck by her ear. Because The vision is a function of her presence. A major problem in her life. These problems may indicate termination, slowing down, and ending the relationship. The emotional presence between them and God knows best. A vision in which the unmarried girl said that she was wearing a neckline and is actually an employee or a university student, or in studies. The vision indicates that the unmarried girl will soon enter A new project that will be profitable for her and a source of a lot of money. Either if the unmarried woman sees that she is buying a neck. The vision indicates that she will buy something valuable that she lived to save her life to buy. Seeing a single girl buying a neck in a dream. The vision shows that God will comfort her after the difficulty that has become as difficult as the fortuneteller’s recovery from an illness. He suffered from it. It also indicates the transition of insight from failure to success in her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a neck or earring in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing a neck in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman wearing an earring in her sleep. The vision shows that the married woman is a woman who knows the teachings of her religion. It indicates The same vision also indicates that a married woman will hear happy news soon in her life. Seeing a married woman in her dream showing off her hair. Her vision indicates that the dreamer is showing off her attractive and beautiful appearance. Seeing a married woman in a dream wearing an earring. The vision indicates that the married woman will give birth soon, with permission. God. In the opinion of Imam Al-Sadiq: Seeing a married woman wearing her neck. The vision shows that the dreamer is a person who is passionate about the Qur’an and loves to get closer to God Almighty. Seeing a married woman in a dream wearing an earring, and the earring is gold and has a beautiful shape. In fact, in her life the dreamer had the desire In completing her education. The vision contains good news for the fortuneteller that God Almighty will achieve for her what He desires, and it is also a sign of her success in life. Seeing a married woman wearing a necklace in a dream. One of the visions that shows the dreamer’s interest in memorizing and interpreting the Book of God. She saw in her dream a married woman wearing An earring and in reality she wanted to obtain high positions. The vision indicates that the woman she sees will soon achieve what she desires. Likewise, seeing a married woman in her dream wearing a very shiny earring. The vision shows the news of her imminent pregnancy and the birth of a boy, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman in Her dream is that she lost her neck or pulled her neck. The vision indicates that there is a problem between her and her husband, and it may be between her family. preview.html: This is what we will learn in this article from the website gptafser.com/ and we will learn the opinion of some of its interpreters and what is the interpretation of the vision in any case. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse with a familiar person in a dream for a single girl: Seeing a single woman having sex with her fiancé in their new home. Good news that her marriage will be fine soon, God willing. God. Or this girl loves her fiancé very much. But if the unmarried girl has intercourse with her brother in the dream. And there will be a dispute between them, which will cause enmity and rivalry between them, and God knows best. The vision also shows that the unmarried woman changes her lifestyle so as not to lose her brother. The unmarried woman has sex. In a dream with someone you know who will benefit from it. Intercourse in a dream for an unmarried woman is very good and provides abundant livelihood, God willing. Seeing a single woman having sex with an old man in a dream. Evidence of the wisdom of her mind and firm decisions regarding her future. If an unmarried girl sees herself naked in a dream. All Her worries that cause her distress will go away after a while. Seeing a small child attached to her is evidence of her attachment and love for that child. A mother is thinking about marriage to have children. Anal intercourse for an unmarried woman means that she will enter into a love relationship that does not suit her. Unique anal intercourse and she was happy with it. Evidence of the many sins and sins committed. Sex from behind in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she will be exposed to worries and problems. Or it will expose her to things that will cause her to lose, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about intercourse with a pregnant woman’s husband. Interpretation of seeing a dream about intercourse with a familiar person in a dream For a married woman: When a married woman sees someone who associates her with her and knows her, she feels happy. She will go to him to ask for help and assistance. It also indicates her desire to solve the problems of her home and family. When a married woman has intercourse with a well-known and famous person. She desires this person and hopes that he will communicate with her or He meets her in reality. Intercourse with a familiar person in a married dream. Evidence of her desire to know everything this person does in terms of effort or work. When a married woman has intercourse with someone she knows but she was sad and forced. Evidence of many sins and transgressions that she will actually commit. Or That this married woman is cheating on her husband and is her mahram, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse with a familiar person in a dream about a man and its meaning. If a man sees himself in a dream having sex with his wife’s sister at home. Evidence that there are many disputes between him and his wife’s family. If one sees in The dream is that he is getting married with a friend who was with him at work and he was happy about it. Evidence of their close relationship. A man’s marriage with another man like him in a dream means Satan’s interference in their relationship. The vision is a warning from God to deal with this man within the limits of work. Intercourse in a dream is for a man. It means his care and concern for his family. Socializing in general in a dream, positive changes and happy news. A man getting married with his father in a dream indicates his victory over his enemy. A man seeing in a dream that he is having sex with a friend. This means that this friend provides him with support, encouragement and assistance in reality. But if he has intercourse with his wife in the dream

title: Interpretation of epilepsy in a dream Epilepsy in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of epilepsy for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and madness in the head according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq and others. And whoever dreams that he is afflicted with madness and faints without knowing himself, then he will become sad or bewitched, or his money will be plundered, or a calamity will befall him. It was said that The dress is from the inheritance, and perhaps the Sultan’s possession was from his family, the boy’s madness with money and his father’s money, and the woman’s madness was the fertility of the year. Seeing a seizure resulting from epilepsy is often the result of a psychological condition you are going through and is one of the unwanted warning symbols. Seeing a person with epilepsy in your dream indicates To a bad omen, anger, conflict and violence. This dream can indicate a high state of anger towards your environment and it can also be a sign of being cautious and avoiding losing important friends. To dream that you are in a state of epilepsy means misfortune and confusion that you may encounter in your life, so that chaos And randomness instead of order and calm. As for seeing your boss at work suffering from epilepsy in a dream, it is also a bad omen and may indicate difficulties at work and obstacles that you may face on your way to success. Seeing a partner, husband or wife suffering from epilepsy in a dream means that He or his mother needs the attention and support that your presence provides in difficult times. Seeing a friend with epilepsy in a dream is also not worthy of praise. This may indicate that there are people in your environment who want to harm you and tarnish your reputation. Interpretation of fainting in a dream - YouTube

title: I dreamed that I was imprisoned

preview.html: I dreamed that I was imprisoned through a website. Look at the website roy2a.com. Imprisonment is a punishment for someone who commits something against the society in which he lives or a crime that must be punished. Prison is a place where a person is deprived of his freedom and is placed in a small social context and performs routine work As a punishment for him and for the purpose of improving his behavior, and seeing the same person imprisoned in a dream is a vision that raises fear and anxiety in the soul, we will explain the most important interpretations that came from the great dream interpreters, such as Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi, Imam al-Sadiq, and Ibn Shaheen, so follow us. I dreamed that I was imprisoned. Seeing himself being released from prison in a sick dream is an indication of... His imminent recovery. Seeing imprisonment from the ruler indicates something bad is happening to the dreamer. Seeing the concerned person leaving prison is an indication of getting out of worry and death of sadness. Seeing a prison executioner in a dream is an indication of false promises made by the divine. Seeing a single person indicates that he is imprisoned in a house at his upcoming wedding. Entering prison Anonymous in a dream refers to the grave. Prison in a dream is free from sins. If one sees that he is imprisoned in a dream, the prison doors are open and there is no roof, it indicates freedom from evil, disease and sadness. Wearing prison clothes in a dream An unpleasant vision foretells bad events that will come to the dreamer. Death sentence. In a dream, it indicates relief, treatment of the sick, food, and a lot of money. Imprisonment in a cage in a dream indicates that the dreamer is lying or bearing false witness. Seeing a prison inside the house in a dream indicates financial crises and sorrows that surround the viewer. Read another explanation: Interpretation of seeing someone in prison in a dream. I dreamed that I I was imprisoned for the sake of Ibn Sirin. Seeing the dreamer’s desire to be imprisoned in a dream indicates his refusal to do a wrong or infallible act that causes sadness and remorse. Seeing the construction of a prison in a dream indicates that the dreamer is an imam among the people who guides them to the straight path. Going to prison unjustly in a dream indicates that the viewer is exposed to injustice in his life, which It makes him feel sorry and sad. Seeing yourself going to prison is unfair in a dream is an indication of the dreamer’s distance from God Almighty, his actions, sins, and his pursuit of desires. Read another explanation: Interpretation of seeing a prisoner outside the prison in a dream. I dreamed that I was imprisoned for unmarried women. Seeing entering a prison in an unmarried woman’s dream is an indication. On her approach to marrying a person with a high social status. Seeing a prison in a room in a person’s dream indicates that this is an indication of her anxiety and extreme fear of problems in her life and prevents her from thinking about them. I dreamed that I was imprisoned for the sake of a married woman. Imprisonment in a married woman’s dream indicates her commitment to her responsibilities and charity. Which she receives because of her honesty. Seeing a guard in a married dream indicates the desires that she seeks to achieve quickly in her life. Innocence and getting out of prison in a married dream indicates overcoming the problems and crises that have plagued her life. Read another explanation: Interpretation of a dream about escaping from prison. I dreamed that I was imprisoned for the sake of a pregnant woman. Seeing prison In a pregnant woman’s dream, it indicates the approaching date of her birth and the health of herself and her fetus. Death sentence in a dream for a pregnant woman. Signs
